alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern New Hanover, southeastern Pender and northeastern Brunswick Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wrightsboro, or 7 miles north of Wilmington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Wrightsville Beach, Surf City, Rich Inlet, Figure Eight Island, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Hightsville, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Wilmington International Airport, Murrayville, Castle Hayne, Scotts Hill, Ogden, Woodside, Mayfaire, Wrightsboro, Topsail and Windemere. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 409 and 416. Interstate 140 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
